attributes.action: Try very hard NOT to offer any taxpayer funded assistance of any sort to the thousands of sex jihadists in Tunisia.
attributes.additional_details: The way our Prime Ministers damaged mind works means we must be prepared to resist any suggestions by him which commits the taxpayers of this country to offering financial compensation or medical assistance to the Tunisian females who were duped into going to Syria to get pregnant.  IT IS NOTHING TO DO WITH US, DAVE, LEAVE US OUT OF IT COMPLETELY.
